alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 9:51PM CDT until October 03 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... East central Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Lelia Lake, or 10 miles east of Clarendon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Quail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
